thread.section_title: Store DJ Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Store DJ | storedj.com.au
thread.title: Adam Brown
thread.title_full: Store DJ reviewed by Adam Brown

author: Adam Brown
title: Adam Brown
text:
After looking high and low for a pair of Audio Technica ATH-M40x to listen to, I called Store DJ and they told me that they would be happy to take a pair out of the box for me.
I turned up on a Saturday morning when the place was fairly busy, yet I was still greeted straight away and set up with the cans that I wanted to try. I spent the next 15 or so minutes doing side by side comparisons with a wide variety of headphones, with a staff member occasionally checking in to see if I needed any assistance.
I was able to do a direct comparison with the more popular, more expensive M50x and found the M40x sounded better to my ear. So, satisfied, I headed off to the counter. The salesperson didn't try to pressure me into the more expensive cans as had been the case in other stores I had visited and even threw in a hard case for free. Absolute legend.
Basically, can't fault them in any way. I just need to keep myself away from their store because I could spend a l t of money in there. The range of equipment on display is amazing.
